jibe.sdk.client.communitymanager
Class CommunityService

java.lang.Object
  jibe.sdk.client.JibeServiceBase<ICommunityManager>
      jibe.sdk.client.communitymanager.CommunityService

public class CommunityService
extends JibeServiceBase<ICommunityManager>

Each user can be a member of a number of social networking or IMS communities. This class provides access to Jibe Realtime Engine support for managing these communities.

          Standard constructor.

isRegistered

public boolean isRegistered(Community community)
                     throws JibeServiceException
Checks whether the user is registered with, and logged in to, a community.

Returns:
boolean

getRegistrationState

public RegistrationState getRegistrationState(Community community)
                                       throws JibeServiceException
Retrieve the current registration state for a certain community. The codes in the registration state will be identical to the ones defined in the corresponding events.

Parameters:
community - The community whose registration state is to be returned.
Returns:
The current registration state of that community.
Throws:
JibeServiceException, - if an error occurs within the Jibe Realtime Engine while processing this operation.
JibeServiceException
